title: If re-elected Trump could nominate 3 more supreme court justices. Maybe 4.
selftext:
Breyer is 82.  He will be 86 at the end of the next president’s term.

Thomas is 72 and will be 76.  Alito is is 70 and will be 74.

McConnell has been persuading judges to step down to ensure their replacements will be conservatives.

If this comes to pass, that will leave Sotomayor, 66 now, 70 in 4 years, alone.
